import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'software-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'], }) export class HeaderComponent { signedIn: boolean = true; // expanding links programExpanded: boolean = false; resourcesExpanded: boolean = false; libraryExpanded: boolean = false; // getCurrentYear currentYear: number = new Date().getFullYear(); }
